ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: In the past 30 days, how often you been treated with less courtesy or respect than other people?
In the past 30 days, how often have you received poorer service than other people at restaurants or stores?
In the past 30 days, how often have people acted as if they think you are not smart?
In the past 30 days, how often have people acted as if they are afraid of you?
In the past 30 days, how often have you been threatened or harassed?
What do you think is the main reason for this/these experiences, gender bias?
What do you think is the main reason for this/these experiences, race/ethnicity?
What do you think is the main reason for this/these experiences, class/religious bias?
What do you think is the main reason for this/these experiences, Appearance?
What do you think is the main reason for this/these experiences, Other?
What do you think is the main reason for this/these experiences, Dont know/prefer not to answer?
What do you think is the main reason for this/these experiences, other?
